ambassadors.name: Joseph A. Bell
ambassadors.quote: Nutrition should be as exciting as it is nourishing. IM8 redefines nutrition for me, making health delicious and effective, whether in the kitchen or in my daily routine.

ambassadors.name: TJ DeFalco
ambassadors.quote: On the court, peak performance is non-negotiable. IM8 fuels my energy and mental clarity, helping me stay sharp and push my limits every day.

ambassadors.name: Bobby Rich
ambassadors.quote: As a former athlete and trainer to high performers, including David and Victoria Beckham, it means I need to always be on the top of my game. IM8 helps me to do just that.

ambassadors.name: Carmel Rodriguez
ambassadors.quote: Body positivity and strength are at the heart of my wellness philosophy. IM8 helps me stay energized, strong, and ready to inspire others to achieve balance every day.

ambassadors.name: Tavi Castro
ambassadors.quote: As a professional freediver, I'm extremely careful with what I put into my body. With IM8, I know I'm fueling my body with only the best, helping me stay resilient both in and out of the water.
